title: [Self-directed] Activity-Based Learning Design for Strengthening Programming Fundamentals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic arithmetic and understanding of logical structures
context.additional_context: Need to improve the ability to apply abstract concepts based on practical experience

learning_goals: Students can design and implement five or more basic algorithms using sequential logic, conditional statements, and loops.
Within 24 hours of completing a learning activity, learners receive feedback and achieve an error correction rate of 80% or higher.
At the end of the course, 85% or more of learners achieve continuous submission of weekly programming assignments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
